title: error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/subst.rs:529:17: type parameter `T/#1` (T/1) out of range when substituting, substs=['_#2r]

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```bash $ git clone https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift.git $ git checkout issue_81709_repro $ ./prepare.sh $ ./build.sh ``` rustc_codegen_cranelift commit: https://github.com/bjorn3/rustc_codegen_cranelift/commit/3afca541193dfce60992660bd07cc449b4d55fd1 Wasmtime commit: https://github.com/bjorn3/wasmtime/commit/9db6e779ef8c4cea9d4d0fe6d0bb08dbd4c39d40 ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (d4e3570db 2021-02-01) binary: rustc commit-hash: d4e3570db4c007089035b833cc20c7fc2f8cb32f commit-date: 2021-02-01 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/subst.rs:529:17: type parameter `T/#1` (T/1) out of range when substituting, substs=['_#2r] ```
